HotelElement.Name: Ramada Hotel Rio de Janeiro Recreio Shopping

Description.Text: At Ramada Recreio Shopping, guests can enjoy the on-site bar or have a meal at the restaurant. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. Every room at the hotel is air conditioned and has a TV with cable channel, and a private bathroom fitted with a shower. Free toiletries and a hairdryer are offered. The property is located inside a shopping mall where guests will find shops and a variety of services such as bars, a fitness centre, beauty salons and a private parking.
